spec_data.Name: piglit
spec_data.License: MIT and GPLv2+ and GPLv3 and LGPLv2
spec_data.Description:
Piglit is a collection of automated tests for OpenGL implementations.

The goal of Piglit is to help improve the quality of open source
OpenGL drivers by providing developers with a simple means to
perform regression tests.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 30 Oct 2017 02:29:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Collection of automated tests for OpenGL implementations
